pages.title: Paltaeria
pages.text: The light blue color is the trademark of this ore. It is found exclusively in the end in small clusters.$(br)Like the end itself, the curious properties of this material are not to be overlooked.

pages.title: Paltaeria Gem
pages.text: Rarely can one carve an intact stone. It can be used in recipes for which the Fragments were simply too small. Though with effort you can merge those together.

pages.title: Paltaeria Floatblock
pages.text: From your previous experience with Paltaeria, you can already guess that it would not be a good idea to place this block in open sky.$(br2)The arrow on this block will service you as a reminder - your future self will thank you.
